item.title: LoveIt-AddImage
item.author: Author
item.description: 1.普通插入，遵循markdown插入语法 2.实现图片轮播 看这里——>参考此篇文档 例子如下(My DesktopImages) #slide-window { position: relative; width: 695.333px; height: 350px; overflow: hidden; top: 0px; left: 0px; } #slides-list { width: 695.333px; height: 350px; position: absolute; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0.66s ease; -webkit-transition: all 0.66s ease; } .slide { list-style: none; position: relative; float: left; margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 695.333px; height: 350px; background: #ccc; text-align: center; line-height: 100%; background-size: cover; background-position: 50% 50%; color: #fff; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); -webkit-transform-style: preserve-3d; } .
